name: Dangerous School
description: Immerse yourself in an exciting and tense game where you play the role of a mysterious boy stuck in a school warehouse. Completely devoid of memories of your identity and the reasons for coming here, your goal will be to escape this sinister place and uncover your own secret. You will be faced with complex puzzles and amazing tasks that you will have to solve on the go, trying not to catch the eye of the terrible monster that is tirelessly hunting for you. Don't let fear take over you, otherwise your adventure will end in the dull chaos of a school warehouse. Improve your logic, find hidden clues and escape routes to regain your true identity and end this nightmare once and for all. You will face unforgettable tests in which you will learn what you are capable of in extreme situations. Are you ready to face your own fears and lead yourself to victory?
